title: json-config-sync Configuration
description: Configuration file for json-config-sync CLI tool that syncs JSON/YAML config files across multiple Git repositories

fileName.description: Target filename. Extension determines output format: .json → JSON, .yaml/.yml → YAML

mergeStrategy.description: Default array merge strategy for all repos. 'replace' replaces arrays, 'append' adds overlay after base, 'prepend' adds overlay before base

content.description: Base configuration inherited by all repos. Supports environment variables: ${VAR}, ${VAR:-default}, ${VAR:?message}

oneOf.description: Multiple Git repository URLs (each becomes a separate sync target)

git.description: Git repository URL(s). Supports GitHub (git@github.com:owner/repo.git, https://github.com/owner/repo.git) and Azure DevOps formats

content.description: Per-repo content overlay merged onto base content. Use $arrayMerge directive to control array merging

override.description: If true, use only this repo's content and skip merging with base content
